document_data.name: Orlen
document_data.mainbody: '''Orlen''' was a male [[human]] of the village of [[West Harbor]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Orlen was a respected old farmer who kept his crops in good health. However, in [[1374 DR]], his crops were not doing good and Orlen couldn't report the problem to the [[druid]]s, who would tell him what the problem was.

After the [[Kalach-Cha]] became the Knight Captain, Orlen was invited to come to the keep, to tend to the fields.
